short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KntrolEMAIL allows you to store and track all your sent emails. Maintain a complete record of your email communications securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KntrolEMAIL is an email management tool designed to help you securely store and track all of your sent emails. With KntrolEMAIL, you can maintain a comprehensive record of your outgoing communications, ensuring that important emails are never lost and can be easily accessed whenever needed.

Key features:

Secure Email Storage: Automatically save all sent emails for future reference.
Email Tracking: Keep track of your sent emails, including when and to whom they were sent.
Effortless Management: Manage your sent emails efficiently with organized records, reducing clutter in your inbox.
Data Privacy: Your email data is securely stored, ensuring privacy and protection.
Whether for professional or personal use, KntrolEMAIL simplifies email management and helps you stay organized.
